name: Oligopoly
description:
In Oligopoly, you will fight for monetary supremacy with other pawns, like in the famous board game Monopoly. However, there is a twist: those pawns are nothing but past versions of you!

Throughout the game you will time travel and meet previous versions of yourself, you will buy properties, and experience the strange effects of time.

Because of time travel, multiple players can own the same tiles at the same time, hence the name Oligopoly.

This game was made during the "A jam about time" game jam. Thanks for playing the game, and feel free to leave any feedback in the comments!
